title: Dinda mayasi
author: Dinda mayasi
content: On Friday 13 May 2022, Binance officially delisted several trading pairs for the Luna and UST crypto assets. Binance stated that the LUNA/BUSD, LUNA/USDT, LUNA/BTC, LUNA/ETH, LUNA/UST token pairs were removed and terminated after the price dropped 99%.Many investors were surprised and did not expect that the delisting would be carried out so suddenly. However, Binance said this step needs to be done so that investors can avoid even greater losses.What do you think, can Luna still live again?!

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PMHowever, Binance said this step needs to be done so that investors can avoid even greater losses.So after having 99.99% down he finally decided to take it down. This is a perfect politically correct statement. Now you can not talk negative about CZ at all. He has taken what he thought was right. I am really sorry for the losers who are directly helping these pump and dump shitcoin inventors to make their money.

comments.author: Ararbermas
comments.body: Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PM What do you think, can Luna still live again?! there's no hope on this project because investors are really disappointed how it end up like this after all.  And it was delisted in a very popular exchange which is in binance?, so for sure this can make an impact to make the situation worse in the future. So i don't think there's still a chance to recover.

comments.author: SamboNZ
comments.body: If you bought the bottom you could've gain 6000% there were lucky gamblers that were able to turn their $100 bet into $10k. Also binance relisted it who know maybe there is still that chance that it could rise up again.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: SamboNZ on May 15, 2022, 05:41:10 AMIf you bought the bottom you could've gain 6000% there were lucky gamblers that were able to turn their $100 bet into $10k. Also binance relisted it who know maybe there is still that chance that it could rise up again.If you bought the bottom At 1$ you are close to -100%. If you bought the bottom at 0.03$ you are -99%. It was impossible to target exact bottom.Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PMWhat do you think, can Luna still live again?!Although its dead ... its f*king top 30 CMC now because of circulating supply that hit the roof. Everyone who is catching the bottom now at 0.0003$ will most likelyu be whipe out because this project does not deserve to be even in top 300 CMC.

comments.author: bestcoins1
comments.body: Quote from: Ararbermas on May 15, 2022, 01:23:14 AMthere's no hope on this project because investors are really disappointed how it end up like this after all.  And it was delisted in a very popular exchange which is in binance?, so for sure this can make an impact to make the situation worse in the future. So i don't think there's still a chance to recover. However, for now the Binance exchange has re-listed LUNA, but it is still not certain if it will recover in the near future because the market is still not supportive of any recovery at this time so it is only natural that for now there are still investors who are disappointed because they have been harmed by decrease in the price of LUNA in the market.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: Binance's face-to-face change is scarier than the ex-lover's rejection. I saw CZ criticize the team and head of Terra Luna, but then he went on to bring the news of having a private meeting with them to save the coin. I also saw an opportunity and was willing to lose a few dozen dollars over the past few days to see how long this comedy would go on, and after seeing my account xx quickly after a good night's sleep, I think that the money spent on buying back BTC would be better to continue with their play. But it's also sad to see that the previous investors who accompanied Luna are insolvent and many people have also chosen death to stop their journey. It's so sad for them and it's sad to see what happened.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: I think the trust of Terra Luna have been lost on the public and if it do make recovery , the weak hodlers will dump to recover the investment made or close to it. If CZ and the Luna team have plans to relist the coin you know a compromise is somewhere around. Now selling @0.0002 is such a low price, I hope it can come back from this fall.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PMMany investors were surprised and did not expect that the delisting would be carried out so suddenly. However, Binance said this step needs to be done so that investors can avoid even greater losses.Lol giving an announcement when the coin has been going down for more than 99% from its started price. This is a big shame for binance and CZ was suggesting luna to did buy and burn mechanism but who was the guy that stupid enough to buy the hyper inflation coin like that? this mechanism will make only people who bought at the dip become the next millionaires and those who invested before the hacker will still lose their money. Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PMWhat do you think, can Luna still live again?!It can't and never. The mega hyper inflation has been destroying everything and it's still running right now.

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Quote from: gantez on May 15, 2022, 12:28:42 PMI think the trust of Terra Luna have been lost on the public and if it do make recovery , the weak hodlers will dump to recover the investment made or close to it. If CZ and the Luna team have plans to relist the coin you know a compromise is somewhere around. Now selling @0.0002 is such a low price, I hope it can come back from this fall.There's a big trust issues already with LUNA and their current plan to revive this projects looks not ok to some investors. As a small time buyer like me, I think it is still good to have some LUNA because there's still a chance for them to rise and I believe  CZ will help them on this and possible will give more advices so they can rise again. The coming days will be more crucial for LUNA and let's see if they can recover from this or will declare a bankrupt later on.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Yeah no idea why they decided to remove it and then a few hours later relist it. If you bought when it was relisted you would of made crazy money.Only reason I can think is because they stopped the chain and the supply increase was capped. Before it went from like 100M coins to like over a trillion and hence why so many zeros in its price.Even if you bought at 1 cent you would be down big since it reached a low of $0.000005 or something similar.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: killerfrost on May 15, 2022, 10:42:36 AMBinance's face-to-face change is scarier than the ex-lover's rejection. I saw CZ criticize the team and head of Terra Luna, but then he went on to bring the news of having a private meeting with them to save the coin. I also saw an opportunity and was willing to lose a few dozen dollars over the past few days to see how long this comedy would go on, and after seeing my account xx quickly after a good night's sleep, I think that the money spent on buying back BTC would be better to continue with their play. But it's also sad to see that the previous investors who accompanied Luna are insolvent and many people have also chosen death to stop their journey. It's so sad for them and it's sad to see what happened.are there truly any confirmed suicides

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PMWhat do you think, can Luna still live again?!it is indeed hard to say nowadays because the effect is still there and also there are no big support coming in LUNA's way now so how could anyone look at the recovery?maybe there are 2 scenarios to come  and those are .LUNA will totally die soon?orLUNA will increase in the coming years.but as of now , lets admit the fact that there are many losers from this investment .

comments.author: onecall123
comments.body: Profits were astronomical for those who bought early in the relisting process. Even though I didn't invest, I've seen many investors make 50 to 100 times their money. There have been people who have lost their fortune and rebuilt within 24 hours. You shouldn't be afraid to admit you are not a fan of volatility.Perhaps it goes to zero or maybe it comes back up in one year when they say they are trying to fix things and learn from their mistakes. I doubt it will be reborn, since there is a trust issue.

comments.author: whiteblue
comments.body: Quote from: kotajikikox on May 16, 2022, 04:26:15 AMit is indeed hard to say nowadays because the effect is still there and also there are no big support coming in LUNA's way now so how could anyone look at the recovery?maybe there are 2 scenarios to come  and those are .LUNA will totally die soon?orLUNA will increase in the coming years.but as of now , lets admit the fact that there are many losers from this investment .Everything in coin development there are only 2 things up or down, so there is no choice for all coins right, so even though in luna the coin has a dramatic level of achievement one of the possibilities will be achieved in the future, so I assume there is still hope for the coin luna because how could there possibly be a big pump because it seems that CZ really cares about Luna development and there are millions of assets invested from the binance lab.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PMWhat do you think, can Luna still live again?!No, and more i read of what's happened, more i think Do Kwon is heading to prison. And Do Kwon should rather just quit now because every way he wants to fix this seems like another scam.Some reading:https://dailyhodl.com/2022/05/15/binance-ceo-breaks-silence-says-terra-luna-should-have-handled-the-collapse-differently/

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on May 16, 2022, 03:46:35 AMare there truly any confirmed suicidesYou are skeptical about that information. I don't know if you can find out for yourself and verify the information spread on social media. I am also quite skeptical about the information that other people mention and share, but the truth is that this happened in the locality where I live. Sharing with you about the person I know of, he hanged himself, and neighbors discovered his body when he couldn't be contacted and discovered the smell of corpses wafting around. And I know it's not only happening in my country because in the past few days I have also read information about suicides related to their having lost all their assets from investing groups and KOL. I think this is true because the amount of money is very large and with ordinary income I am thinking it is almost the property they have accumulated in a lifetime. And can you understand that feeling if you put yourself in their position? I personally have felt that this life is difficult, but the problem of money and material things never makes me think it will decide mind "life or die" because this life can control them.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Quote from: onecall123 on May 16, 2022, 05:30:48 AMProfits were astronomical for those who bought early in the relisting process. Even though I didn't invest, I've seen many investors make 50 to 100 times their money. There have been people who have lost their fortune and rebuilt within 24 hours. You shouldn't be afraid to admit you are not a fan of volatility.Perhaps it goes to zero or maybe it comes back up in one year when they say they are trying to fix things and learn from their mistakes. I doubt it will be reborn, since there is a trust issue. Those who buy when LUNA is re-listed are indeed very big because I see prices going up thousands of percent, of course those who buy at the base price can earn 100x more, but the fact is that with the increase it doesn't give anything to early investors who buy high prices, which for maybe a little but what is stuck in the current price is much bigger than I expected.Actually there are a lot of conspiracies about the luna problem who don't know what actually happened about the price dropping so deep 99% even though they will fix this it won't work 100% in my opinion.

comments.author: South Park
comments.body: Quote from: Dinda mayasi on May 14, 2022, 11:05:34 PM On Friday 13 May 2022, Binance officially delisted several trading pairs for the Luna and UST crypto assets. Binance stated that the LUNA/BUSD, LUNA/USDT, LUNA/BTC, LUNA/ETH, LUNA/UST token pairs were removed and terminated after the price dropped 99%.Many investors were surprised and did not expect that the delisting would be carried out so suddenly. However, Binance said this step needs to be done so that investors can avoid even greater losses.What do you think, can Luna still live again?!After such a crash there was not much to do, those that are trading luna right now are just speculating with it while those that are still holding their coin and were unwilling to sell have to accept they just lost whatever they invested in luna, I am really sorry for them but after reading a little bit more about the coin it became obvious to me that it was a scam, and I have great difficulty believing that other people did not thought the same but were blinded by the potential profits they thought they could get, and now they are paying the consequences of their mistake.

comments.author: manok jepang
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on May 16, 2022, 03:46:35 AMQuote from: killerfrost on May 15, 2022, 10:42:36 AMBinance's face-to-face change is scarier than the ex-lover's rejection. I saw CZ criticize the team and head of Terra Luna, but then he went on to bring the news of having a private meeting with them to save the coin. I also saw an opportunity and was willing to lose a few dozen dollars over the past few days to see how long this comedy would go on, and after seeing my account xx quickly after a good night's sleep, I think that the money spent on buying back BTC would be better to continue with their play. But it's also sad to see that the previous investors who accompanied Luna are insolvent and many people have also chosen death to stop their journey. It's so sad for them and it's sad to see what happened.yes you are right, this sadness cannot be expressed in words where this incident was very sudden without any chaos and events, it's really very sad, hopefully with CZ meeting with the team and the head of the developer TERRA LUNA this case can resolved, at least Terra Luna is still listed on Binance, because it can heal the bleeding heart of Terra users.
